wobani.component.light.blinnphong

Class BlinnPhongLightSources

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongLightSources

  • public class BlinnPhongLightSources
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the Blinn-Phong light sources and refreshes them in the VRAM if necessary.

      private static void createUbo()
      Creates a UBO for the main directional light if the last UBO isn't usable.

      Creates a UBO for the main directional light and binds to the 2nd binding point.

      • refresh

        public static void refresh()
        Refreshes in the VRAM all the Blinn-Phong light sources changes since the last frame.

      • refresh

        @Internal
static void refresh(@NotNull
                               BlinnPhongDirectionalLightComponent light)
        Refreshes the given directional light source in the VRAM. It adds, removes or updates the light if necessary. If the VGA side objects are released, this method recreates them.
        Parameters:
        light - directional light sources
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - parameter can't be null

      • refreshCurrentTile

        private static void refreshCurrentTile(@NotNull
                                       BlinnPhongPositionalLightComponent light)

        Parameters:
        light - positional light sources

        private static void bindTile(@Nullable
                             BlinnPhongLightSources.LightSourceTile lst,
                             int index)

      • computeClosestTileCenters

        @NotNull
private static java.util.List<org.joml.Vector2i> computeClosestTileCenters(@NotNull
                                                                                     org.joml.Vector2i closestTileCenter,
                                                                                     @NotNull
                                                                                     org.joml.Vector2i offset)
        Returns the 4 closest tile centers based on the given closest tile center and offset.
        Parameters:
        closestTileCenter - the center of the closest tile
        offset - offset
        Returns:
        the 4 closest tiles

      • computeOffset

        @NotNull
private static org.joml.Vector2i computeOffset(@NotNull
                                                         org.joml.Vector3f absolutePosition,
                                                         @NotNull
                                                         org.joml.Vector2i closestTileCenter)
        Returns the offset for the closest tiles. You can get the 4 closest tiles by adding to the closest tile (0; 0), (offset.x; 0), (0; offset.y), (offset.x; offset.y).
        Parameters:
        absolutePosition - position
        closestTileCenter - closest tile's center
        Returns:
        the offset for the closest tiles

      • computeOffsetCoordinate

        private static int computeOffsetCoordinate(int closestTileCenterCoordinate,
                                           float absolutePositionCoordinate)
        Returns one of the offset vector's coordinates.
        Parameters:
        closestTileCenterCoordinate - one of the closest tile's coordinates
        absolutePositionCoordinate - one of the absolute position's coordinates
        Returns:
        one of the offset vector's coordinates
